1 Find ID
<form action=""> <input type="text" name="name" value="$!request.name" /> <input type="submit" value="Go" /> </form> <%
name = request.name sql = groovy.sql.Sql.newInstance('jdbc:mysql://localhost/gelcprod', "xwiki", "gelc", "com.mysql.jdbc.Driver")
id1 = 0 fullname = "" try { sql.eachRow("select xwd_id as id1,xwd_fullname as fullname from xwikidoc where xwd_fullname like '${name}'") { id1 = it.id1 fullname = it.fullname } } catch (Exception e){ sql.close() } println "* ID: ${id1}" println "* Fullname: ${fullname}" sql.close() %>
